channel.title: stock on Dive into nexus of everything
channel.description: Recent content in stock on Dive into nexus of everything

item.title: downloading annual report of companies in china
item.description: library(RSelenium) library(Rwebdriver) library(dplyr) check_handle <- FALSE count <- 0 while(!check_handle || count > 20){ count <- count + 1 windows_handles <- remDr$getWindowHandles() if(length(windows_handles) < 2){ Sys.sleep(1) }else{ check_handle <- TRUE } remDr <-remoteDriver( browserName = "chrome", remoteServerAddr = "localhost", port = 4444L) remDr$open() url <-"http://www.cninfo.com.cn/new/index" remDr$navigate(url) library(rvest) webpage <- ead_html(remDr$getPageSource()[[1]][1]) remDr$quit() lirun <- remDr$findElement(using = "css selector", value = "#common_top_input_obj") remDr$mouseMoveToLocation(webElement = lirun) lirun$clickElement() remDr$click() webpage <- read_html(remDr$getPageSource()[[1]][1]) nianfen <- remDr$findElement(using = "css selector", value = "#mainSelect") nianfen$clickElement() remDr$mouseMoveToLocation(webElement = nianfen) remDr$mouseMoveToLocation(x= 0, y = 500 ,webElement = nianfen) niandu <- remDr$findElement(using = "partial link text", value = "") remDr$getWindowPosition(windowId = "current") remDr$getWindowSize() remDr$getActiveElement() remDr$mouseMoveToLocation(webElement = nianfen) remDr$click(buttonId = 0) remDr$mouseMoveToLocation(x = 0 , y =500) remDr$mouseMoveToLocation(x = 0 , y =30) remDr$click(buttonId = 0) niandu <- remDr$findElement(using = "link text", value = "") niandu$clickElement() remDr$mouseMoveToLocation(webElement = niandu) huzhuban <- remDr$findElement(using = "partial link text", value = "") remDr$mouseMoveToLocation(webElement = huzhuban) shuru <- remDr$findElement(using = "css selector", value = "#common_top_input_obj") wenben <- list("", key = "enter") shuru$sendKeysToElement(wenben) ###code 是股票代码 for (i in 70:3761) { code[[i]] <- paste0(paste0(rep("0",6 - nchar(all[i])),collapse = ""),all[i],collapse = "") } ########################### remDr$open() url <-"http://www.

item.title: cash flow of four prominent companies(original data filter by lin le)
item.description: this is our stocks: 603977,国泰集团 002669,康达新材 603601,再升科技 002444,巨星科技 library(tidyverse) library(RColorbrewer) cashflow <- read.csv("FI_T61.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE, encoding = "UTF-8") colnames(cashflow)[1] <- "id" core_stock <- c("603977","002669","603601","002444") cashflow$id <- as.character(cashflow$id) for (i in 1:72350) { a <- nchar(cashflow[i,1]) if(! a == 6 ){ cashflow[i,1] <- paste0(paste0(rep(0,6-a),collapse = ""),cashflow[i,1]) }else{} } df_core <- filter(cashflow, id %in% core_stock, Typrep == "A") inputting the industrial of every stock(extract from 同花顺) industrial <- read.csv("个股当前数据(同花顺导出).csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE) industrial[,1] <- str_extract(industrial[,1],pattern = "\\d+") %>% unlist() industrial <- industrial[c("代码","名称","细分行业","所属行业")] colnames(industrial) <- c("id","name","sub_industry","industry") df_core <- df_core %>% left_join(industrial) cashflow <- left_join(cashflow, industrial) print the industry of our stocks select(df_core,id,name,sub_industry,industry) %>% distinct(id,.
